name: This is a game
description:
My name is Julien and I have nothing else to do so I made this game. 🥰
This is a game is an indie game made by a stupid 19-year-old Canadian.😃
This game is very cute and I put a lot of love in it! You will have to earn coins to buy better pet and kill some Yve (They are the rock monster).
You can also find some Bob running every were.
This is a game is a 2D platform game with cute graphics where you can jump, run, kill some mobs and earn coins….. Much more coming soon.
